channel.title: Kiss Linux blog by Xar-Me-Ison
channel.description: A software technology blog about Kiss Linux

item.title: Kiss Linux - a minimalistic Linux distribution
item.description:
Kiss Linux is a minimalist and lightweight Linux distribution that prioritises simplicity and user control. It follows the Keep It Simple, Stupid" philosophy and aims to provide a stable and customisable platform for advanced uers.

Tags: kiss-linux, software-technology, sw-blog
item.dc:creator: Charalampos Makrylakis (P2019214)
